text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Delayed WorkMail email delivery>
We are investigating increased WorkMail SMTP E-Mail processing time in the US-EAST-1 Region resulting in a delay of received or sent email to client applications.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Delayed WorkMail email delivery>
We are continuing to investigate increased WorkMail SMTP E-Mail processing time in the US-EAST-1 Region, resulting in a delay of received or sent email to client applications.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Delayed WorkMail email delivery>
Between 10:45 AM and 2:10 PM PST we experienced increased WorkMail SMTP E-Mail processing time in the US-EAST-1 Region, resulting in a delay of received or sent email to client applications. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
